definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: lit. the raw rice is now cooked (idiom); fig. it is done and can't be changed/It's too late to change anything now./also written 生米煮成熟飯|生米煮成熟饭
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zuo4 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: abbr. for 生米煮成熟飯|生米煮成熟饭, lit. the raw rice is now cooked (idiom); fig. it is done and can't be changed/It's too late to change anything now.

sentences.chinese: 那些花生米都給裹上糖衣。

sentences.english: I bought a bag of salted peanuts.
Crumble the peanuts up so that Granny can have some.
sentences.chinese: 把花生米碾碎，這樣奶奶才能喫點。

sentences.english: Buy me some peanuts and Cracker Jacks .
sentences.chinese: 給我買些花生米和鬆脆餅幹。

sentences.english: Don't have to cook mature rice, but also a rice porridge.
sentences.chinese: 生米不一定煮成熟飯，有的也會成生米粥。
那廚子弄碎了那些花生米。

sentences.english: If she chooses to, each passenger will be given a single peanut.
sentences.chinese: 如果她選擇去，每位旅客將會得到一顆花生米。

sentences.english: All day long, they follow the swan boats, and eat peanuts.
sentences.chinese: 他們整天都跟在天鵝船的後面喫花生米。

sentences.english: 1979 was the year they burst into inarguable reality.
sentences.chinese: 1979年他們終於把生米做成了熟飯。

sentences.english: This main research of method determines the residue amount of the butyral hydrazine in the peanut kernel fast.
sentences.chinese: 本方法主要研究了快速測定花生米中丁酰肼的殘留量。

sentences.english: I'll have two packets of peanuts.

definition: the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: lit. the raw rice is now cooked (idiom); fig. it is done and can't be changed/It's too late to change anything now./also written 生米煮成熟飯|生米煮成熟饭
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zuo4 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
half-cooked/(fig.) not completely done, solved, developed etc/Taiwan pr. [jia4 sheng5]
